summary: PASSENGER SIDE AIR BAG HAS CREATED ENOUGH PRESSURE ON THE DASHBOARD MATERIAL SO AS TO CAUSE A 6 INCH VERTICAL SPLIT IN THE MATERIAL.   IS THIS AN INDICATION THAT THE AIR BAG COULD PREMATURELY DISCHARGE AND POSSIBLY PRESENT A HAZARD TO A PASSENGER AND/OR STARTLE THE DRIVEN SUFFICIENTLY SO AS THE PRECIPITATE AN ACCIDENT.  *NLM
